Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: WB #103 buses will operate via 103rd, Longwood, 107th, and Western, then resume their normal route on 103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Westbound #103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Longwood, 107th, and Western, then resume their normal route on 103rd.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to construction on 103rd/Leavitt.

Headline: #9 Ashland & #X9 Ashland Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/Archer
ShortDescription: SB #9 Ashland & #X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Archer, Damen,35th and Ashland, due to police activity near Ashland/Archer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland & #X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Archer, Damen, 35th, then resume their normal route on Ashland, due to police activity near Ashland/Archer.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
